items.preText: Nayeem: "Those two sixes of Soumya reminds me Sourav Ganguly who also loved to dancing down of the spinners to hit sixes over mid wicket." - it was a bit reminiscent of Ganguly, yes
items.text: given some air, pitches on a length outside off, but he comes on the front foot to defend
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: flatter, but he comes down the track and tickles it to short fine leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: cracker of a shot he had come down the track the previous ball. This time, he gets it in the slot, outside off and he gives himself room while coming down. Picks it up and cover drives it straight over the fence. Stunning shot
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.text: fuller on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: Soumya is in a hurry to finish this goes down on on knee and waits for the ball to come, slog-sweeps it to the square leg fence
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: down the track again, and I think he was eyeing the midwicket roof but he didn't get hold of it as well. Still got enough meat on it to send it racing to the square leg fence.
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length outside off, opens the face to steer to short third man
items.shortText: Powell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on the stumps, he comes down to swat it, but misses completely. The ball goes over the stumps
items.shortText: Powell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: back of a length, angling into the batsman. He goes for the pull and misses and is struck on the pad. They appeal and go for the review when it's not given. Looked like it would miss leg, but West Indies have to review. Ultra edge shows no bat, but it's a lot closer than it looked. The ball was clipping leg stump, so it's umpire's call. West Indies retain their review, but Soumya survives
items.shortText: Powell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: another back of length ball angling into him, but this time he doesn't try to hit it too hard. Helps it along to deep midwicket with a more controlled pull
items.shortText: Powell to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: fuller , angling into the pads and straightening a touch. Defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Powell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length outside off that time, and Tamim comes forward to defend solidly to point
items.shortText: Powell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Bangladesh need 23 runs only. And 90 balls remain
items.text: fuller on the stumps, blocked
items.shortText: Paul to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: leg stump goes for a walk might be too late to affect the match, but it's a victory for the bowler nonetheless. Soumya's impetuousness gets the better of him. He tried to whip a ball across the line that was too full, ends up playing all around it, and it sneaks through bat and pad to take out the stumps
items.shortText: Paul to Soumya Sarkar, OUT

items.text: good length outside off, he defends off the front foot to point
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, he steers it to third man to get off the mark. The man had to run to his left which allowed them to take two
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: slower ball, off-cutter bowled on off stump. He's equal to it though and pats it back gently to the bowler's right
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length on off, pushed to extra cover
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText:
Tahseen: "Tamim really wanted Soumya to score that century. I could hear him say "don't take a run" through the mic."

ferdous06: "it's quite difficult to score 20 runs out of 23. hope Soumo learns this lesson. fantastic innings though. "
items.text: back of a length angling into the batsman but ends up on his pads, and his turned this to fine leg
items.shortText: Powell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: oooh, beaten. In the channel outside off, slightly back of a length. Mushfiqur finds himself reaching for it without moving his feet and is beaten
items.shortText: Powell to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: fuller on off stump, driven to extra cover off the front foot
items.shortText: Powell to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: inside edge goes for four well bottom edge technically. This was bowled wide of off, and Mushfiqur went hard at it, again without moving feet. Kept a little low and it takes his under-edge to go to the keeper's left. He got a glove to it, but couldn't stop it
items.shortText: Powell to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: patted back to the bowler
items.shortText: Powell to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: beaten again. In the channel again and Mushfiqur's bat is going like a magnet to the ball in that channel. Feet not moving. He pokes at thin air again
items.shortText: Powell to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full outside off, given some room and he goes on his knees for a flowing cover drive. However, can't get past the fielder in the circle, who parries it
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run
